OUTPUT: ['RELIEF - Rest, Elevation, Ice, Light activity, Exercise, Flexibility exerciscups; Temple Acronym for RICE Method and exercise/flexibility techniques often used as a kind of "2 down" treatment.', 'PRICEMEND - Protection, Rest, Ice, Compression, Elevation, Mobilization, Nutrition, Direction; A more comprehensive version of the RICE method, also includes nutritional and direction aspects for complete healing.', 'RESTRAINT - Rest, Elevation, Stabilization, Tendons care, Ice, Non-impact exercise, Therapy; Incorporates restraining actions to avoid further injury along with ice, therapy etc.', 'FLEXCARE - Flexibility exercises, Light activity, Exercise, Cold application, Acupuncture, Rehabilitation, Endurance building; This combination focuses on flexibility and includes various treatments like acupuncture for recovery.', 'BLISTERBAND - Bandaging, Ice, Lidocaine gel (for pain relief), Stretching exercises, Therapy, Rest, Electrostimulation; A holistic approach to treating blisters or mild injuries with a focus on rest and therapy.', 'HARMREDUCE - Heat application avoidance, Alcohol consumption moderation, Running avoidance, Massage delay; This list is more of preventive measures after an injury to reduce harm rather than treatment but still applicable as "2 down" care.', 'WISECARE - Water therapy, Ice, Splinting or taping, Elevation, Compression wraps; A combination including water exercise and ice for injuries that require immobilization.', 'RESCUEMED - Rest, Exercise, Cryotherapy (ice application), Ultrasound therapy, Endurance training, Diet adjustment; Treatment emphasizing exercise and cryotherapy with a focus on diet.', 'SLEEPFIT - Stretching exercises, Light activity, Elevation, Pain relief measures, Fitness routine; This approach combines stretching and light fitness routines for recovery.', 'AIRESTEPS - Application of ice, Ice compression wraps, Rest, Exercise progression, Therapy, Endurance enhancement; Emphasizes gradual increase in activity (steps) during the healing process.', 'COOLCURE - Cryotherapy (cooling), Osteopathy treatment, Omega-3 supplementation, Low impact exercises, Rehabilitation exercises, Endurance training; Incorporates cooling and osteopathic treatments with omega-3s for inflammation.', 'RESTARCH - Rest, Elevation, Strengthening exercises, Tape/splint application, Acupressure therapy, Cold therapy, Healing nutrition; This regimen combines strength and cold treatments with acupressure for recovery.', 'DRIECELL - Diet adjustment, Rest, Ice, Electrostimulation, Cryotherapy (cooling), Exercise modification, Lymphatic drainage massages; Focuses on diet and electrostimulation with modifications to exercise routines.', 'STIMLOCK - Splint application, Taping techniques, Ice therapy, Mobility exercises, Lightweight lifting, Optimal load management, Kinesiology taping; This combines various taping and splint methods with a focus on managing loads during recovery.', 'CHILLHEAL - Cryotherapy (chilling), Hydration, Ice compression wraps, Lymphatic massage, Healing nutrition, Elevation, Aquatherapy; Combines chilling treatments with hydration and aquatic exercises for recovery.', 'STREAMLINE - Stretching exercises, Therapeutic ultrasound, Rest, Ice therapy, Massage/acupuncture, Lymph drainage techniques, Increase in exercise intensity gradually; This focuses on stretching and therapeutic modalities with gradual increases to activity.', 'GENTLECARE - Gentle exercises, Ice therapy, Non-impact activities, Taping/splint application, Lymphatic drainage techniques, Electrostimulation, Rehabilitation exercises; A gentle approach focusing on non-impact activities and rehab.', 'FLOWHEAL - Fluid intake, Oscillation therapy (e.g., vibration), Low impact exercise routine, Warm compress application, Hydrotherapy, Elevation, Anti-inflammatory nutrition; Combines fluid management with oscillation and warmth for treatment.', 'NURTUREFIX - Nutritional adjustments (for healing), Ultrasound therapy, Rest, Therapeutic exercises, Rehabilitation techniques, Ice application, Elevation; Focus on nutrition and ultrasound as key components of a comprehensive treatment plan.', 'MENDMASS - Massage therapy, Electrostimulation, Nutritional support (for recovery), Dietary adjustments for inflammation, Ice application, Stretching exercises; Combines massage with electrostimulation and a focus on diet.']
